DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare binocular high contrast , high illumination ( HC/HI ) visual acuity near ( 40 centimeter ) new multifocal contact lenses AIR OPTIX® AQUA MULTIFOCAL contact lenses worn 9 hour .
DOC.detailed_description: Each participant randomize specific sequence lens wear , lens type worn bilaterally 9 hour compare performance characteristic .
DOC.criteria: Sign write Informed Consent document . Have spectacle provide acceptable vision willing wear unable wear study lens . Be presbyopic spectacle add ≥ 0.50 diopter . Currently wear soft contact lenses least 5 day week . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply Eye injury surgery within 12 week enrollment trial . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Currently enrol clinical trial . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses ( least 9 hour ) use accessory solution determine Investigator . Any use medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined Investigator . Binocular visual acuity bad 20/25 . Corrected monovision . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
